author: Cox Media Group National Content Desk
title: Kim Kardashian speaks out about Lamar Odom: 'I believe in the...
text:
Reality TV star Kim Kardashian commented publicly on Lamar Odom's hospitalization Saturday, taking to social media to speak out.
"I have faith in you. I believe in the power of prayer and positive energy!" she wrote on Instagram . "Thank you all for your prayers! Lammy – I'm so happy Kendall & I could make you smile today! God is good!"
>> Click here to see her post
I have faith in you. I believe in the power of prayer and positive energy! Thank you all for your prayers! Lammy- I'm so happy Kendall & I could make you smile today! God is good!
A photo posted by Kim Kardashian West (@kimkardashian) on Oct 17, 2015 at 9:44pm PDT
"Kendall" refers to Kardashian's half-sister Kendall Jenner, a fellow star of E!'s "Keeping Up With the Kardashians."
According to The Associated Press , Odom, estranged husband of Khloe Kardashian, regained consciousness Friday, three days after he was hospitalized in Nevada after two women found him unconscious at a legal brothel.
>> RELATED: 7 things to know about Lamar Odom's hospitalization
>> PHOTOS: Lamar Odom fighting for his life
>> RELATED: Kobe Bryant leaves game early to visit Lamar Odom
>> RELATED: Lamar Odom found unconscious at Nevada brothel​
>> Read more trending stories
"He woke up, and he spoke," Alvina Alston, a publicist for Odom's aunt JaNean Mercer, told the AP .
The AP reports that Odom also gave a thumbs-up and said hi to Khloe, who has been at his bedside, according to someone close to the family.
Meanwhile, officials continued to investigate Odom's $75,000 visit to the Love Ranch. Dennis Hof, the brothel's owner, told the AP that staffers brought Odom there last Saturday because he "wanted to get away, have a good time and relax." On Tuesday, two women checked on him in his room, where he was unconscious. Odom was taken to Desert View Hospital in Pahrump, then transported to Las Vegas' Sunrise Hospital.
Odom told employees that he had taken cocaine before his arrival at the ranch, according to the AP . Odom did not appear to be taking any illegal drugs at the brothel, but he was seen drinking Cognac and taking "herbal Viagra" called Reload 72-Hour Strong , Hof said.
Learn more here.
